name: Viral Load (Scabbage, mikenseer)
description:
Blast through a firewall's defenses with single use weaponry! Everything you kill drops more guns. Grab guns, destroy the firewall's defenses, pick up more guns, rinse and repeat.

Built for the 2022 VR Game Jam and its "one-time use" theme, runs on SteamVR, Oculus, or Quest.

All gameplay systems and weapon/enemy models created by the VRdojo team, find our Discord at https://vrdojo.games/

--Controls--

Left Joystick: Move/Strafe

Right Joystick: Jump/Turn

"A" Buttons: Dash

"B" Buttons: Drop weapon

Triggers: Shoot

Grip: Grab Weapons/Climb
